reference_a:
@article{stevens2020,
  title = {Body {{Positivity}} (\#{{BoPo}}) in everyday life: {{An}} ecological momentary assessment study showing potential benefits to individuals’ body image and emotional wellbeing},
  shorttitle = {Body {{Positivity}} (\#{{BoPo}}) in everyday life},
  author = {Stevens, Alicia and Griffiths, Scott},
  date = {2020-12-01},
  journaltitle = {Body Image},
  volume = {35},
  pages = {181--191},
  issn = {1740-1445},
  doi = {10.1016/j.bodyim.2020.09.003}
}
topics: body positivity, social media, affect, body satisfaction, fitspiration
sampling_scheme: 6x/day semi-random intervals with anchor times and 40 minute period around them
additional_comments: no day and beep information available; some variable coding unclear

features.name: day
features.coding: not available

features.name: beep
features.coding: not available

features.name: weekend
features.coding:
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: response_lag
features.coding: Survey response time (in minutes, max. 45 minutes)

features.name: response_time
features.coding: Survey completion time (in minutes)

features.name: responded_fixed
features.coding:
Meaning not fully clear, either whether participants completed the survey at all or whether they experienced some of the content stated below
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: thins_exposure
features.coding:
Have you seen thinspiration since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate unique exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Thinspiration exposure only

features.name: fits_exposure
features.coding:
Have you seen fitspiration since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate unique exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Fitspiration exposure only

features.name: bo_po_exposure
features.coding:
Have you seen body positivity since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate unique exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Body positivity exposure only

features.name: dual_thin_fits
features.description: Dual exposure to thinspiration and fitspiration
features.coding:
Have you seen thinspiration/fitspiration since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate double exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Thinspiration and fitspiration exposure

features.name: dual_thin_bo_po
features.description: Dual exposure to thinspiration and body positivity
features.coding:
Have you seen thinspiration/body positivity since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate double exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Thinspiration and body positivity exposure

features.name: triple_exposure
features.description: Triple exposure to thinspiration, fitspiration, and body positivity
features.coding:
Have you seen thinspiration/fitspiration/body positivity since the last questionnaire? Recoded by the authors to indicate double exposure
0 = No exposure
1 = Thinspiration, fitspiration, and body positivity exposure

features.name: weight_satisfaction
features.coding:
How satisfied with your weight are you right now?
State body satisfaction
0 = extremely dissatisfied
100 = extremely satisfied

features.name: appearance_satisfaction
features.coding:
How satisfied with your appearance are you right now?
State body satisfaction
0 = extremely dissatisfied
100 = extremely satisfied

features.name: shape_satisfaction
features.coding:
How satisfied with your shape are you right now?
State body satisfaction
0 = extremely dissatisfied
100 = extremely satisfied

features.name: anxious
features.coding:
How anxious are you right now?
State negative affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely

features.name: guilty
features.coding:
How guilty are you right now?
State negative affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely

features.name: depressed
features.coding:
How depressed are you right now? Wording not fully clear here, as the article states "upset" instead of depressed
State negative affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely

features.name: confident
features.coding:
How confident are you right now?
State positive affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely

features.name: happy
features.coding:
How happy are you right now?
State positive affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely

features.name: inspired
features.coding:
How inspired are you right now?
State positive affect
0 = not at all
100 = extremely
